headline: Why Apple CEO Tim Cook will be with Apple for the long haul
summary: Neuberger Berman senior research analyst, Dan Flax, joins Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton to discuss Apple's (AAPL) C-suite changes and explain why he believes Apple CEO Tim Cook will have a long-term role with Apple. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.
